post.description: Change the authenticated user's password. All existing sessions are invalidated on success.
Authenticate a user with email and password. Issues an access token in the response body and sets a refresh token as an httpOnly cookie.
Revoke the current session's access token and clear the refresh token cookie.

get.description: Return the currently authenticated user's profile. Also refreshes the CSRF token in the X-CSRF-Token response header.

post.description: Issue a new short-lived access token using the refresh token stored in the httpOnly cookie.

401.description: Unauthorized - missing, invalid, or expired refresh token

501.description: Not Implemented - refresh tokens not supported

post.description: Create a new user account. Behaviour depends on the server's registration mode: open (email verification sent), approval (pending admin activation), or closed (403 returned).
Issue a new email verification link for an unverified account. Always responds with success to prevent email enumeration.
Validate a password-reset token and update the user's password. Invalidates all existing sessions.

400.description: Bad Request - missing, invalid, or expired token

csrf_token.description: CSRF token for protecting state-changing requests

path.description: Only the Path field can be updated

signed_urls.description: Map of file ID to signed URLs and thumbnails

meta.description: Optional meta field for signed URLs

thumbnails.description: map of thumbnail size to signed URL

file_path.description: Deprecated: will be removed after migration

area_id.description: For commodities: which area they belong to

location_id.description: Relationship fields for preserving hierarchy snapshot

created_at.description: CreatedAt is when the file was created

description.description: Description is an optional description of the file

ext.description:
Ext is the file extension including the dot.
Example: ".pdf"

linked_entity_id.description: LinkedEntityID is the ID of the linked entity (commodity or export)

linked_entity_meta.description:
LinkedEntityMeta contains metadata about the link type
For commodities: "images", "invoices", "manuals"
For exports: "xml-1.0" (version of the export file format)

linked_entity_type.description: LinkedEntityType indicates what type of entity this file is linked to (commodity, export, or empty for standalone files)

mime_type.description:
MIMEType is the MIME type of the file.
Example: "application/pdf"

original_path.description:
OriginalPath is the original filename as uploaded by the user.
Example: "invoice.pdf"

path.description:
Path is the filename without extension. This is the only field that can be modified by the user.
Example: "invoice-2023"

tags.description: Tags are optional tags for categorization and search

title.description: Title is the user-defined title for the file

type.description: Type represents the category of the file (image, document, etc.)

updated_at.description: UpdatedAt is when the file was last updated
